definition: to cry out against injustice/to protest unfairness
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Why don't you protest more about the current war in the Middle East?
sentences.chinese: 爲何自己不能多爲近代的中東戰爭鳴不平呢？

sentences.english: Nothing would prevent him speaking out against injustice.
sentences.chinese: 什麼也不能阻止他鳴不平。

sentences.english: He aired his grievance in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 他在報紙上爲自己鳴不平。

sentences.english: They murmured at the treatment they had received.
sentences.chinese: 他們對所受的待遇鳴不平。

sentences.english: They went grumbling back down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 他們去鳴不平的放棄原主張小山。
